translations: n.牛轭 U 字形部分; U 字形弯曲
adj.呈 U 字形弯曲的

phrs.translation: 爱宝, 美国爱宝, 鐖卞疂, 型河床
牛轭湖, 牛角湖, 新月湖
奥克斯伯公共市场, 牛轭市场

sentences.sentence: Wetlands often develop in the meander scars of dried-up oxbow lakes.
sentences.translation: U型湖干掉后的曲流痕往往孕育出湿地。

sentences.sentence: An oxbow lake may survive as a water body for some time, especially if groundwater seeps into it.
sentences.translation: U型湖作为水体的一种也许能持续一段时间，尤其当地下水汇进来。

sentences.sentence: He tied off both ends of the oxbow with fine black thread, snipped them, and pushed them back under the skin.
sentences.translation: 他用细黑线系住U形两端，再剪断它们，把它们放回到皮肤下面。
